Reasons To Shop With Ideas:

FREE Nationwide Delivery
We offer FREE of cost delivery across Pakistan. There is no spending limit to avail free delivery. Products starting from as low as PKR 450 will be delivered to your address without any additional charges.
24x7x365 Customer Support
We offer uninterrupted, real-time online customer support with Live chat on our website. You can contact us on our Facebook Page. Our email handling services are available to assist you with all your queries, simply contact our customer care department by emailing us at customerservice@gulahmedshop.com or you can call us at +92-21-111-143-327.
Payment security and Convenience
We have secure integrated channels to offer you a seamless online payment experience. For the convenience of our customers we also offer Cash on Delivery nationwide for quick and easy distribution.
30-Days Return/Exchange Policy
You may return a product within 30 days of delivery. Products purchased online can be exchanged from any of our branches nationwide even suring sale period. For the utmost convenience of our customers we offer pick-up from your doorstep. If you need to return a product, contact our customer care department by emailing us at customerservice@gulahmedshop.com or call us at +92-21-111-143-327.

Don't live in Pakistan? Worry not. We offer FREE global shipping on all orders above 150USD. During SALE periods we offer FREE worldwide shipping on all orders above 250USD
